import java.io.*;
import java.math.*;
public class Main
{
    public Main() throws Exception
    {
    	BufferedReader in=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
	    BufferedWriter out=new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));
	    int test=Integer.parseInt(in.readLine());
	    while(test-->0)
	    {
	    	long l=Long.parseLong(in.readLine());
	    	BigInteger k=new BigInteger(""+l);
	    	String ans="NO";
	    	int r=k.toString(2).length()-1;
	    	for(int i=2;i<=r;i++)
	    	{
	    		int root=(int)Math.pow(l,1/(double)i);
	    		if(new BigInteger(""+root).pow(i).equals(k)||new BigInteger(""+(root+1)).pow(i).equals(k))
	    		{
	    			ans="YES";
	    			break;
	    		}
	    	}
	    	out.write(ans+"\n");
	    }
	    out.flush();
    }
    public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception
    {
	    new Main();
    }
}
